item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to my first blog ever, this is also my first ever attempt at starting something that would let me share my knowledge/experiences with the world or at least with the people I force to read this(my friends, or just my wife or my dog if she could read :D ). Why now? Why did I decide to start a blog post in my mid 30’s which for some might be a little late, as I have seen many a folks maintain a blog post since the time of the Y2K and still maintain it to date with hundreds of posts.
